# How to Install MTK USB All Drivers on Windows PC
 
If you are using an Android device powered by MediaTek chipset, then you may need to install the MTK USB All Drivers on your Windows PC. These drivers are essential for connecting your device to the computer and performing tasks such as flashing firmware, transferring files, rooting, etc. In this article, we will show you how to download and install the MTK USB All Drivers on your Windows PC.
 
## All Mtk Android Drivers Use After 1.2 6.5 Rar


[**Download**](https://lodystiri.blogspot.com/?file=2tKGgb)

 
## What are MTK USB All Drivers?
 
MTK USB All Drivers are a set of drivers that enable your Windows PC to recognize and communicate with your MediaTek device. These drivers are also known as MediaTek Preloader USB VCOM Drivers or MediaTek DA USB VCOM Drivers. They are required for flashing firmware using tools like SP Flash Tool, Miracle Box, etc. They also help you to transfer data between your device and PC, root your device, backup and restore your device, etc.
 
## How to Download MTK USB All Drivers?
 
You can download the latest version of the MTK USB All Drivers from the link below. The file is in ZIP format and contains the drivers for all versions of Windows OS, including Windows XP to Windows 11 (x32 or x64 bit). The file size is about 55 MB.
 
[Download MTK USB All Drivers](https://androidmtk.com/download-mtk-usb-all-drivers)
 
## How to Install MTK USB All Drivers?
 
Before installing the MTK USB All Drivers, make sure you have disabled the driver signature verification on your Windows PC. This is necessary because these drivers are not digitally signed by Microsoft and may cause security warnings. To disable the driver signature verification, follow these steps:
 
1. Press the Windows key + R on your keyboard to open the Run dialog box.
2. Type `shutdown.exe /r /o /f /t 00` and press Enter. This will restart your PC and take you to the Advanced Startup Options menu.
3. Select Troubleshoot > Advanced Options > Startup Settings > Restart.
4. Press F7 on your keyboard to select Disable driver signature enforcement.
5. Your PC will reboot and you can proceed with the driver installation.

To install the MTK USB All Drivers, follow these steps:

1. Extract the downloaded ZIP file to a folder on your PC.
2. Open the extracted folder and double-click on the `InstallDriver.exe` file.
3. A pop-up window will appear. Click on Yes to continue.
4. A new window will open. Click on Next to start the installation process.
5. Wait for a few seconds until the installation is completed.
6. Click on Finish to exit the installer.

Congratulations! You have successfully installed the MTK USB All Drivers on your Windows PC. You can now connect your MediaTek device to your PC and perform various tasks such as flashing firmware, transferring files, rooting, etc.

## How to Use MTK USB All Drivers?
 
After installing the MTK USB All Drivers, you can use them to connect your MediaTek device to your Windows PC and perform various tasks. Here are some examples of how to use the MTK USB All Drivers:
 
### How to Flash Firmware Using MTK USB All Drivers?
 
If you want to flash firmware on your MediaTek device using tools like SP Flash Tool, Miracle Box, etc., you need to use the MTK USB All Drivers. To flash firmware using MTK USB All Drivers, follow these steps:

1. Download the firmware file for your device and extract it to a folder on your PC.
2. Download and install the flashing tool of your choice on your PC.
3. Launch the flashing tool and load the firmware file.
4. Power off your device and remove the battery (if removable).
5. Connect your device to your PC using a USB cable.
6. The flashing tool will detect your device and start the flashing process.
7. Wait for the flashing process to complete and disconnect your device from your PC.
8. Reinsert the battery (if removable) and power on your device.

You have successfully flashed firmware on your MediaTek device using MTK USB All Drivers.
 
### How to Transfer Files Using MTK USB All Drivers?
 
If you want to transfer files between your MediaTek device and your Windows PC, you need to use the MTK USB All Drivers. To transfer files using MTK USB All Drivers, follow these steps:

1. Power on your device and enable USB debugging mode. To enable USB debugging mode, go to Settings > About Phone > Tap on Build Number 7 times > Go back to Settings > Developer Options > Enable USB Debugging.
2. Connect your device to your PC using a USB cable.
3. Your PC will recognize your device and install the necessary drivers.
4. Open My Computer or This PC on your PC and locate your device under Portable Devices or Removable Disk.
5. Double-click on your device and access the internal storage or SD card of your device.
6. You can now copy, paste, delete, or move files between your device and PC as you wish.

You have successfully transferred files between your MediaTek device and your Windows PC using MTK USB All Drivers.
